messages.message:
You guys are awesome, thanks for the brainstorming help! Will try all of these.

Here's another: affix `C` and arrange `A` and `B` to abut from the sides. Up until some threshold of slide, slide in `A` and `B` in from the sides until some maximal overlap score is reached. Then affix all three. Now vary the trim on the inner tails of `A` and `B` to  maximize the overlap score (same value function, different parameters fixed/changing)
@Hari Master now has Emerson OCR running so you can get the raw polys in either IBOCR format or the ThriftService in the intermediate format
